database.updateSQLByInsertReply: UPDATE co_operation SET jobId = ?,serviceUri = ?,rep_status = ?,rep_CreateTime = ?,rep_LastModifiedTime= ? ,req_UpdateTime= ? WHERE operationId= ?
database.selectSQL: select req_instanceId,instanceId,req_serviceId,instanceType,req_orgId,operationId,oprationType,req_UpdateTime,jobId,serviceUri, rep_status,rep_CreateTime,rep_LastModifiedTime from co_operation where req_UpdateTime IN (SELECT MAX(req_UpdateTime) FROM co_operation) AND req_instanceId =
